properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 7 at 3:39AM EST until February 8 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation through daybreak, then heavy snow and
blowing snow. Snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches and
additional ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch.
Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Ontario county.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Widespread accumulating snow and ice will create dangerous travel
conditions.

Submit snow and ice reports through our website or social media.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST SATURDAY
